Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.description: Bans a user from the server.

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.description: Kicks a user from the server.

Moderation.name: mute
Moderation.description: Mutes a user for a specified duration.

Moderation.name: warn
Moderation.description: Issues a warning to a user.

Moderation.name: clear
Moderation.description: Deletes a specified number of messages from a channel.

Moderation.name: lock
Moderation.description: Locks a channel, preventing users from sending messages.

Utility.name: user
Utility.description: Displays information about a specific user.

Utility.name: roleinfo
Utility.description: Provides information about a specific role.

Utility.name: poll
Utility.description: Creates a poll for users to vote on.

Utility.name: level
Utility.description: Find your level on the server

Utility.name: xp
Utility.description: Find your xp on the server

Fun and Engagement.name: roll
Fun and Engagement.description: Rolls a random number between 1 and the specified number.

Leveling.name: level
Leveling.description: Displays the user’s level in the server.

Leveling.name: shop
Leveling.description: Displays items available for purchase with the server’s currency. (coming soon)

Leveling.name: buy
Leveling.description: Allows users to purchase items from the shop. (coming soon)

Event and Reminder Commands.name: event
Event and Reminder Commands.description: Creates a server event with specific details.

Event and Reminder Commands.name: remindme
Event and Reminder Commands.description: Sets a personal reminder for the user.

Event and Reminder Commands.name: reminder
Event and Reminder Commands.description: Sets a server-wide reminder for an event or announcement.

Administration Commands.name: disablecommand
Administration Commands.description: Disables a specific command in the server.

Administration Commands.name: logchannel
Administration Commands.description: Sets a specific channel for logging moderation actions and events.
